patterns: What are the courses available in your college?
responses: Our college offers B.Tech in CSE, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, and IT. We also provide postgraduate courses like M.Tech, MBA, and MCA.

patterns: Tell me about the CSE department.
responses: The Computer Science and Engineering department focuses on programming, artificial intelligence, data science, and software development. It has modern computer labs, experienced faculty, and good placement records.

patterns: What is the fee for CSE course?
responses: The annual fee for B.Tech in CSE is around ₹85,000. It may change slightly depending on hostel and transport facilities.

patterns: How many years is the CSE course?
responses: The B.Tech in CSE is a 4-year undergraduate course divided into 8 semesters.

patterns: What subjects are taught in CSE?
responses: Some core subjects include Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Management Systems, Computer Networks, AI, and Machine Learning.

patterns: What is the placement record for CSE?
responses: CSE students are placed in top companies like Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Amazon, and Accenture with good salary packages.

patterns: Tell me about the ECE department.
responses: The Electronics and Communication Engineering department teaches communication systems, VLSI, microprocessors, and embedded systems. It has advanced labs and active research projects.

patterns: How much is the fee for ECE?
responses: The fee for B.Tech in ECE is approximately ₹80,000 per year.

patterns: Duration of ECE course?
responses: The ECE course duration is 4 years, with 8 semesters including lab work and projects.

patterns: Tell me about the EEE department.
responses: The Electrical and Electronics Engineering department focuses on power systems, control systems, and electrical machines. It has well-equipped electrical labs and experienced staff.

patterns: Fee for EEE course?
responses: The yearly fee for B.Tech in EEE is around ₹78,000.

patterns: Tell me about the Mechanical department.
responses: The Mechanical Engineering department deals with design, thermal systems, manufacturing, and robotics. Students get hands-on training in workshops and CAD/CAM labs.

patterns: How much is the Mechanical Engineering fee?
responses: The Mechanical Engineering course costs around ₹82,000 per year.

patterns: Tell me about Civil Engineering department.
responses: The Civil department offers subjects like structural design, construction management, and geotechnical engineering. It also provides site visits and field training for practical learning.

patterns: Fee for Civil Engineering?
responses: The Civil Engineering course fee is approximately ₹80,000 per year.

patterns: Tell me about the IT department.
responses: The Information Technology department focuses on software development, cloud computing, and data analytics. It provides good placement support in top IT companies.

patterns: Fee for IT course?
responses: The IT course fee is around ₹83,000 per year.

patterns: What is the eligibility for admission?
responses: Students must have passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics and should qualify in EAMCET or equivalent entrance exam.

patterns: Do you provide hostel facilities?
responses: Yes, hostel facilities are available for both boys and girls with clean rooms, good food, Wi-Fi, and security.

patterns: What is the hostel fee?
responses: The hostel fee is around ₹35,000 to ₹45,000 per year depending on room type and facilities.

patterns: Is canteen available inside the campus?
responses: Yes, our college has a hygienic canteen that provides tasty and affordable food for students and staff.

patterns: What are the placement opportunities?
responses: Our college has tie-ups with many reputed companies. Every year, students get placed in companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, HCL, and Tech Mahindra.

patterns: How is the faculty?
responses: All departments have highly qualified and supportive faculty members who guide students in academics, projects, and placements.

patterns: What are the facilities available in the campus?
responses: The campus includes computer labs, libraries, sports grounds, seminar halls, a cafeteria, and transportation facilities.

patterns: Does the college offer scholarships?
responses: Yes, scholarships are provided to meritorious students and those eligible under government welfare schemes.

patterns: Tell me about MBA course.
responses: The MBA course is a 2-year postgraduate programme focusing on Finance, HR, and Marketing with practical exposure and internships.

patterns: What is the fee for MBA?
responses: The MBA fee is around ₹90,000 per year.

patterns: Tell me about MCA course.
responses: The MCA course is a 3-year postgraduate programme focusing on computer applications, software design, and programming.

patterns: Fee for MCA?
responses: The MCA course fee is approximately ₹85,000 per year.

patterns: Is Wi-Fi available in campus?
responses: Yes, the entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled for students and faculty.

patterns: Are internships provided?
responses: Yes, the college encourages internships and the placement cell helps students connect with reputed companies.

patterns: Is transport facility available?
responses: Yes, transport buses are available from major nearby cities and towns for both students and staff.

patterns: Tell me about the library.
responses: The library is spacious with thousands of books, journals, and digital resources. It is open from morning till evening for student access.

patterns: Is there a separate hostel for girls?
responses: Yes, we have separate and secure hostels for boys and girls with 24-hour security and wardens.

patterns: Does the college conduct cultural events?
responses: Yes, our college organizes annual cultural fests, sports meets, and technical events for student engagement.

patterns: What is the admission process?
responses: Admission is based on entrance exam ranks like EAMCET, followed by counselling and document verification.

patterns: Does the college offer M.Tech?
responses: Yes, M.Tech courses are offered in CSE, ECE, and Mechanical branches.

patterns: Is there a training and placement cell?
responses: Yes, our Training and Placement Cell provides guidance, mock interviews, and soft skill sessions for students.

patterns: What is the timing of college?
responses: The regular class timings are from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM, Monday to Saturday.

patterns: Does the college have a medical facility?
responses: Yes, there is a first-aid centre with medical staff available on campus for students and staff.

patterns: Can I get admission through management quota?
responses: Yes, a limited number of seats are available under the management quota as per college and government guidelines.

patterns: What are the lab facilities?
responses: Each department has its own labs. CSE has programming labs, ECE has communication and VLSI labs, and Mechanical has workshops.

patterns: What companies visit for placements?
responses: Companies like Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Accenture, HCL, Amazon, and Tech Mahindra visit our campus for placements.

patterns: What is the dress code in college?
responses: Students are expected to wear formal dress. On lab days, lab coats are mandatory. Uniforms are required on specified days.

patterns: What is the strength of each branch?
responses: Each branch generally admits around 120 students per year, depending on the intake capacity approved by AICTE.

patterns: What is the total fee for 4 years B.Tech?
responses: The total fee for 4 years of B.Tech is around ₹3.2 to ₹3.4 lakhs depending on the branch.

patterns: Tell me about campus area
How big is the campus?
Campus size?
Area of Vel Tech campus
College land area
Campus infrastructure details
How large is the college campus?
responses: Vel Tech University campus is spread over approximately 66.75 acres with a built-up area of around 1.5 lakh square meters. It has modern classrooms, labs, hostels, and other world-class facilities.

patterns: What is the placement rate?
How is the placement record?
Tell me about the placement percentage
Placement success rate in Vel Tech
How many students get placed every year?
responses: Vel Tech University maintains a strong placement record with around 80% to 90% of eligible students placed every year. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and Tech Mahindra.

patterns: How many blocks are there in the college?
Number of blocks in Vel Tech
Tell me about the college blocks
Blocks in the campus
How many buildings are there?
Total blocks in Vel Tech University
responses: Vel Tech University has several academic and administrative blocks including separate blocks for each department, research centres, libraries, and hostels — totaling around 29 major academic blocks within the campus.

responses: Hello there! 😊 I’m EduBot, your friendly college assistant. How can I help you today?

patterns: How can I contact the college?
responses: You can contact us through the official website or call the admission helpline available in the contact section.
